text: It ’ s easy to get lost in the swell of superhero entertainment. Justice League and Thor : Ragnarok both come out next month. The new trailer for Black Panther just dropped last week. A slew of superhero television shows, including The Defenders, The Tick, Inhumans, Runaways, and The Punisher, have recently debuted or are set to debut later this year, joining the ranks of existing series like Agents of S. H. I. E. L. D., Legion, Arrow, Supergirl, The Flash, and Marvel ’ s ever - growing stable of Netflix series. The thought of adding another entry to such a crowded docket feels more like a taunt than a treat. But somehow, despite the ongoing deluge of capes and cowls, one new series this
